spell.name: Hetesis' Heavy Limb
entries: You attempt to transform the limb of a creature that is moving. It must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the limp solidifies into a heavy metal until the end of the creature's turn and no effect happens on a succesful save.

Creatures with a Strength score lower than your spellcasting DC, are knocked {@condition prone} if they attempt move, while those with the score equal or above your spellcasting DC have their speed reduced by 15 feet. Nonetheless, each creature takes {@damage 1d4} force damage as their flesh changes.
The spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d4}), 11th level ({@damage 3d4}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d4}).
